item.title: Itineraries
item.description:
Day-1

  • Site Visits
    • Bells Beach: Bells Beach
    • Great Ocean Road Chocolaterie & Ice Creamery
    • Split Point Lighthouse: Aireys Inlet
    • Memorial Arch: Eastern View
    • Erskine Falls: Lorne
    • Lorne Beach: Lorne
    • Sheoak Falls: Lorne
    • Apollo Bay Beach: Apollo Bay
  • Stay
    • Apollo Bay’s Premier Apartment Hotel: Apollo Bay
      • Rent: AUS $135 for one night.

Day-2

  • Site Visits
    • Maits Rest Rainforest Walk: Cape Otway
    • Cape Otway Lightstation: Cape Otway
    • Great Otway National Park: Cape Otway
    • Loch Ard Gorge: Port Cambell
    • The Twelve Apostles: Port Cambell
    • Port Cambell Beach: Port Cambell
  • Stay
    • Loch Ard Motor Inn: Port Cambell
      • Rent: AUS $195 for one night.

Day-3

  • Visits
    • The Arch: Port Cambell
    • The London Bridge: Peterborough
    • The Grotto: Peterborough
  • Return
    • (Peterborough) Via C164 - C163 - A1 - M1 (Melbourne)
